measured_by: Correlation between subjective and optimal state values (heuristic quality metric)
justification: “Heuristic quality reflects how close a participant's subjective weights … are to the optimal weights… Heuristic quality is therefore the correlation between the subjective state values … and objectively optimal state values.”
